edge_1: Marlin meets Dory, a blue tang with acute short-term memory loss, who offers to help him find Nemo.
edge_2: Dory encounters Bruce while trying to help Marlin find Nemo.
edge_3: Bruce, Anchor, and Chum are three sharks who have sworn to abstain from eating fish.
